label: Barcode Scanners
description: Devices used to scan and read barcodes and QR codes.

subcategories.label: Handheld Barcode Scanners
subcategories.description: Portable barcode scanners that can be held in the hand.

subcategories.label: Mobile Barcode Scanners
subcategories.description: Barcode scanners that can be used with mobile devices.

subcategories.label: Desktop Barcode Scanners
subcategories.description: Barcode scanners that are designed for use on a desktop.

subcategories.label: QR Code Scanners
subcategories.description: Barcode scanners that are specifically designed to read QR codes.

subcategories.label: Pet Microchip Scanners
subcategories.description: Scanners used to read microchips implanted in pets.
